summary: During the GOP debate in Cleveland on August 5th, 2015, Governor Chris Christie claimed that the lying and stealing has already occurred, in response to Mike Huckabee's criticism of Congress changing the retirement program.

During the GOP debate in Cleveland on August 5th, 2015, Mike Huckabee claimed that the Internal Revenue Service (IRS) could be eliminated by implementing the FairTax, a consumption-based tax system. Bret Baier then asked Ben Carson if he agreed with Huckabee's statement. Carson responded by saying that he believes in a significantly changed taxation system, and he personally advocates for a system based on tithing, as he believes it is fair.
